cause.description:
The LIVESTRONG Challenge is three events held across the country every year in an attempt to raise money to help find a cure for cancer. I'll be riding 100 miles to help support this cause, and your help, in any way would be much appreciated! So help us out, and donate now at www.livestrong.org
1. Raise cancer awareness
2. Help to find a cure
3. Remind others that no matter what happens, they should always LIVESTRONG
cause.mission: Raise Money to find a cure for cancer
cause.name: The LIVESTRONG Challenge
